Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and antibiofilm activity of designed and synthesized antimicrobial peptide, KABT-AMP.
Literature.Author: Thankappan B, Jeyarajan S, Hiroaki S, Anbarasu K, Natarajaseenivasan K, Fujii N

Literature.Title: Activity of Novel Synthetic Peptides against Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Lum KY, Tay ST, Le CF, Lee VS, Sabri NH, Velayuthan RD, Hassan H, Sekaran SD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=4.67±2.09 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=81.23±8.92 µg/ml,Human vaginal epithelial cells VK2/E6E7:IC50=6.03±1.86 µg/ml,Human esophagus epithelial cells Het-1A:IC50=3.01±0.59 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 2940(60-70% Killing=8µM),Escherichia coli MTCC 2939(60-70% Killing=16µM),Candida albicans MTCC 227(60-70% Killing=4µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=64µg/ml)
